com.github.katjahahn.parser.sections.idata

Class ImportSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.parser.sections.idata.ImportSection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEModule, SpecialSection

    public class ImportSection
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpecialSection
    Represents the import section, fetches information about the data directory entries and their lookup table entries.

        public java.util.List<com.github.katjahahn.parser.sections.idata.DirectoryEntry> getDirectory()
